document.full_text: all eyes are on an expected french open final showdown between claycourt machine rafael nadal and the seemingly invincible novak djokovic in just over a fortnight's time, but rafa could not care less for now.
document.title: family, golf, and isner on nadal's mind -- not djokovic
lines_and_colors: all eyes are on an expected french open final showdown between claycourt machine rafael nadal and the seemingly invincible novak djokovic in just over a fortnight's time, but rafa could not care less for now.
